summary.span: 表示一个服务，该服务提供用于控制工具提示的显示和行为的属性和事件。

span.span: Represents a service that provides properties and events to control the display and behavior of tooltips.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过设置来定义一个元素的工具提示或属性。You define a tooltip for an element by setting the or property. 工具提示属性会采用一个子级。The ToolTip property takes one child. 子级的内容也有所不同的简单文本字符串更复杂的内容如具有嵌入文本和元素。The content of the child can vary from a simple text string to more complex content such as a that has embedded text and elements. 您可以定义为工具提示内容对象，但这不是必需。You can define tooltip content as a object, but this is not required. 当未定义的工具提示内容作为对象，可以使用属性来定位和自定义工具提示内容。When you do not define the tooltip content as a object, you can use the properties to position and customize the tooltip content. 附加属性的类用于确定放置、 行为和外观的工具提示。Attached properties of the class are used to determine the placement, behavior, and appearance of a tooltip. 定义工具提示在元素上设置这些属性。These properties are set on the element that defines the tooltip. 类和类共享许多相同的属性，用于自定义工具提示。The class and the class share many of the same properties that are used to customize a tooltip. 如果等效并属性均设置，属性优先。If equivalent and properties are both set, the property takes precedence. 例如，如果这两个属性和属性设置为对象、 的值使用属性。For example, if both the property and the property are set for a object, the value of the property is used. 以下计时属性仅为定义类，并由所有工具提示：The following timing properties are only defined for the class and are used by all tooltips: - - - 有关如何处理工具提示打开或关闭时发生的事件的信息，请参阅和字段。For information about how to handle the events that occur when the tooltip opens or closes, see the and fields. ， ， ，和到中具有相同名称的属性的行为类似类。, , , , and behave similarly to the properties of the same name in the class. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Popup 放置行为](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md)。For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用类，以指定工具提示的行为。The following example shows how the use the class to specify the behavior of a tooltip. 设置的属性类将其附加直接到公开工具提示的元素。You set the properties of the class by attaching them directly to the element that exposes the tooltip. summary.span: 获取或设置两个工具提示显示之间的最大时间（第二个工具提示不经延迟即会出现）。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum time between the display of two tooltips where the second tooltip appears without a delay.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，当用户将鼠标指针移到具有工具提示的对象，会出现延迟之前显示工具提示。Typically, when a user moves the mouse pointer over an object that has a tooltip, there is a delay before the tooltip is displayed. 这种延迟是等于的值属性。This delay is equal to the value of the property. 但是，显示的工具提示后没有可以在此期间显示其他工具提示而无需等待的时间段时间以便完成传递。However, after a tooltip is displayed there is a period of time during which another tooltip can be displayed without waiting for the time to pass. 使用指定此时间段属性。You specify this time period by using the property. 当用户移动鼠标在此时间段内具有可见的工具提示为具有工具提示的值的另一个元素的一个元素从不会应用第二个工具提示的属性，第二个工具提示将立即出现。When the user moves the mouse within this time period from one element that has a visible tooltip to another element that has a tooltip, the value of the property for the second tooltip is not applied and the second tooltip appears immediately. 有关如何获取或设置此属性的信息，请参阅和方法。For information about how to get or set this property, see the and methods. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

span.span: The value of the property is less than zero (0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 工具提示控件的默认样式添加投影效果。The default style for a tooltip control adds a drop shadow effect. 如果未显式设置属性，属性值是`false`直到第一次显示工具提示。If you do not explicitly set the property, the property value is `false` until the first time the tooltip is displayed. 时显示的工具提示和样式设置应用的默认工具提示样式属性设置为`true`。The default tooltip style is applied when a tooltip is displayed and the style sets the property to `true`. 如果工具提示对象，且同时属性和指定了属性，值使用属性。If the tooltip is a object and both the property and the property are specified, the value of the property is used. 有关如何获取或设置此属性在代码中的信息，请参阅和方法。For information about how to get or set this property in code, see the and methods. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置附加属性的类。The following example shows how to set the attached property of the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性和属性的值提供对由定义的工具提示的位置的其他调整属性和属性值。The property and the property values provide additional adjustment to the position of a tooltip that is defined by the property and the property values. 行为类似于属性。 behaves similarly to the property. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Popup 放置行为](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md)。For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md). ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values `double` 字符串表示形式值等于或大于 0.0 但小于。A string representation of a value that is equal to or greater than 0.0 but that is smaller than . 这被解释为与设备无关单位 (1/96th 每个单位 1/96 英寸为单位) 度量。This is interpreted as a device-independent unit (1/96th of an inch per unit) measurement. 字符串不需要显式包含小数点。Strings do not have to explicitly include decimal points. `qualifiedDouble` 一个值，后跟以下单位声明字符串之一： `px`， `in`， `cm`， `pt`。A value that is followed by one of these unit declaration strings: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`. `px` （默认值） [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 为英寸;1 中为 96px = =`in` is inches; 1in==96px `cm` 为厘米;1cm==(96/2.54) px`cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px`pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px 有关如何获取或设置此属性在代码中的信息，请参阅和方法。For information about how to get or set this property in code, see the and methods. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

summary.span: 获取或设置工具提示打开前的时间长度。

span.span: Gets or sets the length of time before a tooltip opens.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，当用户将鼠标指针移到具有工具提示的对象，会出现延迟之前显示工具提示。Typically, when a user moves the mouse pointer over an object that has a tooltip, there is a delay before the tooltip is displayed. 这种延迟是等于的值属性。This delay is equal to the value of the property. 但是，显示的工具提示后没有可以在此期间显示其他工具提示而无需等待的时间段时间以便完成传递。However, after a tooltip is displayed there is a period of time during which another tooltip can be displayed without waiting for the time to pass. 使用指定此时间段属性。You specify this time period by using the property. 当用户移动鼠标在此时间段内具有可见的工具提示为具有工具提示的值的另一个元素的一个元素从不会应用第二个工具提示的属性，第二个工具提示将立即出现。When the user moves the mouse within this time period from one element that has a visible tooltip to another element that has a tooltip, the value of the property for the second tooltip is not applied and the second tooltip appears immediately. 有关如何获取或设置此属性在代码中的信息，请参阅和方法。For information about how to get or set this property in code, see the and methods. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置计时属性。The following example shows how to set the timing properties. [!code-xml[ToolTipService#NoToolTip](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ToolTipService/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#notooltip)]

span.span: The value of the property is less than zero (0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定相对于其结构打开时放置控件。The property specifies a structure relative to which the control is positioned when it opens. 如果不是`null`，则结构定义相对于对象。If is not `null`, the structure is defined relative to the object. 否则为指定结构定义相对于屏幕的左上角。Otherwise, the specified structure is defined relative to the upper-left corner of the screen. 如果属性设置为，相对于鼠标、 位置和的值将显示工具提示属性不起作用。If the property is set to , the tooltip is displayed relative to the location of the mouse, and the value of the property has no effect. 此属性是附加的属性。This property is an attached property. 有关如何获取或设置此属性的值在代码中的信息，请参阅和方法。For information about how to get or set the value of this property in code, see the and methods. 行为类似于属性。 behaves similarly to the property. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Popup 放置行为](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md)。For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of time that a tooltip remains visible.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性定义的用户将鼠标指针暂停在定义工具提示的对象上方时，工具提示保持可见的时间。This property defines the time that a tooltip remains visible while the user pauses the mouse pointer over the object that defines the tooltip. 如果用户移动鼠标指针从对象时，工具提示将关闭。If the user moves the mouse pointer off of the object, the tooltip closes. 此属性是附加的属性。This property is an attached property. 有关如何获取或设置此属性的值在代码中的信息，请参阅和方法。For information about how to get or set the value of this property in code, see the and methods. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置属性为工具提示。The following example shows how to set the property for a tooltip. summary.span: 获取或设置工具提示的内容。

span.span: Gets or sets the content of a tooltip.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 工具提示内容的范围从简单的文本字符串到更复杂的对象例如具有嵌入文本和图像的元素。Tooltip content can range from a simple text string to more complex objects such as a element that has embedded controls and images. 但是，工具提示内容无法获得焦点。However, tooltip content cannot take focus. 例如，工具提示不能接收的内部事件。For example, a inside a tooltip cannot receive a event. [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 提供了定义工具提示，并提供可用于指定工具提示行为的属性的控件。provides a control that defines a tooltip and provides properties that you can use to specify tooltip behavior. 但是，工具提示可以是任何元素，如或。However, a tooltip can be any element, such as a or an . 此属性是附加的属性。This property is an attached property. 有关如何获取或设置此属性的值在代码中的信息，请参阅和方法。For information about how to get or set the value of this property in code, see the and methods. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]语法所示此处适合填充工具提示的对象是否具有本机类型转换，如字符串基元类型。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] syntax shown here is appropriate if the object that fills the tooltip is a primitive with native type conversion, such as a string. 如果该对象不支持本机类型转换，也不支持其自己的类型转换器，您可能需要指定附加的属性语法的详细形式，如下所示：If the object does not support native type conversion or support its own type converter, you might need to specify a verbose form of attached property syntax as follows: ``` ``` 占位符元素*相应*如果该对象允许它们还可以具有子元素。The placeholder element *objectThatFillsTheToolTip* could also have child elements, if that object permits them. 但是，这种用法需要应该是相对较少，因为大多数[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]用法将改为使用公开的服务的实际控件实现。However, the need for this usage should be relatively rare, because most [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] usages will instead use practical control implementations of the service that are exposed by . ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何通过使用指定的工具提示。The following example shows how to specify a tooltip by using the . remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性是附加的属性。This property is an attached property. 有关如何获取或设置此属性的值在代码中的信息，请参阅和方法。For information about how to get or set the value of this property in code, see the and methods. 行为类似于属性。 behaves similarly to the property. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Popup 放置行为](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md)。For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md). ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values `double` 字符串表示形式值是等于或大于 0.0 而小于。The string representation of a value that is equal to or greater than 0.0 but smaller than . 这被解释为与设备无关单位 （1/96 英寸） 度量。This is interpreted as a device-independent unit (1/96th inch) measurement. 字符串不需要显式包含小数点。Strings do not have to explicitly include decimal points. `qualifiedDouble` 一个值，后跟以下单位声明字符串之一： `px`， `in`， `cm`， `pt`。A value that is followed by one of these unit declaration strings: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`. `px` （默认值） [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 为英寸;1 中为 96px = =`in` is inches; 1in==96px `cm` 为厘米;1cm==(96/2.54) px`cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px`pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|
